education.title: Indian Institute of Technology (Indian School of Mines), Dhanbad
education.description: Activities and Societies: Entrepreneurship Cell, Literary and Debating Club, Series Society. Got the course of B.Tech in ECE after securing an all-India percentile of 99.99 in JEE Advance 2018. IIT Dhanbad will be one of the most challenging chapters in my life. Be it preparing for the semester exams in a highly competitive classroom, being involved in club activities and extracurricular, it made me a better version of myself!

negotiation.

projects: [{"title":"Uber for Elderly People","start_date":"Oct 2021","end_date":"Oct 2021","description":"Solved a case study problem regarding building an extensionof Uber for elderly people. Designed the user journey,alongwith the additional features, must-have features andgeneral features."},{"title":"Covid-19 Data Exploration using SQL","start_date":"Aug 2021","end_date":"Aug 2021","description":"This is an SQL data exploration project based on the covid-19 deaths and vaccination information. Using SQL queries, we have analysed different complicated questions related to the cases count, death count, vaccination count, etc. of all countries around the globe, so that one can get a clear explanation."},{"title":"A duplet of airports!","start_date":"May 2021","end_date":"May 2021","description":"We analyzed the flight delays across all airports of the United States and recommend which pair of airports should be replaced by a high-speed passenger rail tunnel. We used Apache Impala (for its better response time) in Hue Interface."}]

honors_and_awards.title: Winner in Paridhan
honors_and_awards.description: My team came first in Paridhan, the fashion show of Srijan, 2019, the annual cultural fest of IIT ISM Dhanbad. We were selected first by Miss Asia International from 20 talented teams of Eastern India.
